00014 #include "freqestleastsquare.h"
00015 
00016 void
00017 FreqEstLeastSquare::genSpectrum(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memin,
00018         std::vector<std::complex<double> >& memout,
00019         int t0, double tol, FFT::twindowfunc windowfunc, double windowlength) {
00020     int t = memin.size();
00021     int n = memout.size();
00022     int t0a = t0;
00023     if(t0a < 0)
00024         t0a += (-t0a / n + 1) * n;
00025     
00026     //Fitting with weights.
00027     std::vector<double> weight;
00028     window(t, t0, windowfunc, windowlength, weight);
00029     double wsum = 0.0, w2sum = 0.0;
00030     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00031         wsum += weight[i];
00032         w2sum += weight[i] * weight[i];
00033     }
00034     int wpoints = wsum*wsum/w2sum; //# of fittable data in time domain.
00035     wpoints = lrint(wpoints * numberOfNoises(memin) / (double)t); //# of fittable data in freq. domain.
00036     wpoints = std::min(std::max(wpoints, t/100 + 1), t);
00037 //  fprintf(stderr, "# of data points = %d\n", wpoints);
00038 
00039     //Standard error.
00040     double sigma2 = 0.0;
00041     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00042         sigma2 += std::norm(memin[i]) * weight[i];
00043     }
00044     sigma2 /= wsum;
00045     
00046     // Peak search by ZF-FFT;
00047     std::fill(m_ifft.begin(), m_ifft.end(), 0.0);
00048     std::vector<std::complex<double> > convwnd(m_ifft);
00049     for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00050         m_ifft[(t0a + i) % n] = memin[i] * weight[i];
00051     }
00052     m_fftN->exec(m_ifft, memout);
00053     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00054         memout[i] /= wsum;
00055     }
00056     
00057     std::vector<std::complex<double> > wave(memin);
00058     std::deque<std::complex<double> > zlist;
00059     
00060     double ic = 1e99;
00061     for(int lp = 0; lp < 32; lp++) {
00062         int npeaks = m_peaks.size();
00063         double loglikelifood = -wpoints * (log(2*M_PI) + 1.0 + log(sigma2));
00064         double ic_new = m_funcIC(loglikelifood, npeaks * 3.0, wpoints * 2.0);
00065         if(ic_new > ic) {
00066             if(m_peaks.size()) {
00067                 m_peaks.pop_back();
00068                 zlist.pop_back();
00069             }
00070             break;
00071         }
00072         ic = ic_new;
00073         
00074         double freq = 0.0;
00075         std::complex<double> z(0.0);
00076         double normz = 0;
00077         for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00078             if(normz < std::norm(memout[i])) {
00079                 freq = i;
00080                 z = memout[i];
00081                 normz = std::norm(z);
00082             }
00083         }
00084         freq *= t / (double)n;
00085 
00086         //Prepare exp(-omega t)
00087         std::vector<std::complex<double> > coeff(t);
00088         double p = -2.0 * M_PI / (double)t * freq;
00089         for(int i = 0; i < t;) {
00090             std::complex<double> x = std::polar(1.0, (i + t0) * p);
00091             std::complex<double> y = std::polar(1.0, p);
00092             for(int j = 0; (j < 1024) && (i < t); j++) {
00093                 coeff[i] = x;
00094                 x *= y;
00095                 i++;
00096             }
00097         }
00098         //Standard error.
00099         sigma2 = 0.0;
00100         for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00101             sigma2 += std::norm(wave[i] - z * std::conj(coeff[i])) * weight[i];
00102         }
00103         sigma2 /= wsum;
00104         
00105 //      fprintf(stderr, "NPeak = %d, sigma2 = %g, freq = %g, z = %g, ph = %g, ic = %g\n", 
00106 //          npeaks, sigma2, freq, std::abs(z), std::arg(z), ic);
00107         
00108         // Newton's method for non-linear least square fit.
00109         for(int it = 0; it < 10; it++) {
00110             // Derivertive.
00111             double ds2df = 0.0;
00112             double ds2dx = 0.0;
00113             double ds2dy = 0.0;
00114             // Jacobian.
00115             double d2s2df2 = 0.0;
00116 //          double d2s2dx2 = 1.0;
00117 //          double d2s2dy2 = 1.0;
00118             double d2s2dfx = 0.0;
00119             double d2s2dfy = 0.0;
00120 //          double d2s2dxy = 0.0;
00121             double kstep = 2.0 * M_PI / (double)t;
00122             double k = kstep * t0;
00123             for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00124                 k += kstep;
00125                 std::complex<double> yew = wave[i] * coeff[i] * weight[i];
00126                 std::complex<double> yewzk = std::conj(z) * yew * k; 
00127                 ds2df -= std::imag(yewzk);
00128                 std::complex<double> a = -yew + z * weight[i];
00129                 ds2dx += std::real(a);
00130                 ds2dy += std::imag(a);
00131                 d2s2df2 += std::real(yewzk * k);
00132                 a = yew * k;
00133                 d2s2dfx -= std::imag(a);
00134                 d2s2dfy += std::real(a);
00135             }
00136             ds2df /= wsum;
00137             ds2dx /= wsum;
00138             ds2dy /= wsum;
00139             d2s2df2 /= wsum;
00140             d2s2dfx /= wsum;
00141             d2s2dfy /= wsum;
00142             double detJ = d2s2df2 - d2s2dfx*d2s2dfx - d2s2dfy*d2s2dfy;
00143             double df = -ds2df + ds2dx * d2s2dfx + ds2dy * d2s2dfy;
00144             df /= detJ;
00145             double dx = ds2df * d2s2dfx - ds2dx * (d2s2df2 - d2s2dfy*d2s2dfy) - ds2dy * d2s2dfx*d2s2dfy;
00146             dx /= detJ;
00147             double dy = ds2df * d2s2dfy - ds2dx * d2s2dfx*d2s2dfy - ds2dy * (d2s2df2 - d2s2dfx*d2s2dfx);
00148             dy /= detJ;
00149             
00150 //          fprintf(stderr, "Ds2 = %g,%g,%g\nJ=[%g,%g,%g;%g,1,0;%g,0,1]\nDx=%g,%g,%g\n",
00151 //              ds2df,ds2dx,ds2dy,d2s2df2,d2s2dfx,d2s2dfy,d2s2dfx,d2s2dfy,df,dx,dy);
00152             
00153             double sor = 1.0;
00154             sor = std::min(sor, 0.4 / fabs(df));
00155             sor = std::min(sor, 0.2*sqrt(std::norm(z)/fabs(dx*dx+dy*dy)));
00156             df *= sor;
00157             dx *= sor;
00158             dy *= sor;
00159             freq += df;
00160             z += std::complex<double>(dx, dy);
00161             //Prepare exp(-omega t)
00162             double p = -2.0 * M_PI / (double)t * freq;
00163             for(int i = 0; i < t;) {
00164                 std::complex<double> x = std::polar(1.0, (i + t0) * p);
00165                 std::complex<double> y = std::polar(1.0, p);
00166                 for(int j = 0; (j < 1024) && (i < t); j++) {
00167                     coeff[i] = x;
00168                     x *= y;
00169                     i++;
00170                 }
00171             }
00172 
00173 //          fprintf(stderr, "It = %d, freq = %g, z = %g, ph = %g\n",
00174 //              it, freq, std::abs(z), std::arg(z));
00175             
00176             if((df < 0.001) && (dx*dx+dy*dy < tol*tol*std::norm(z))) {
00177                 break;
00178             }
00179         }
00180 
00181         //Standard error.
00182         double sigma2 = 0.0;
00183         for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00184             sigma2 += std::norm(wave[i] - z * std::conj(coeff[i])) * weight[i];
00185         }
00186         sigma2 /= wsum;
00187         
00188         m_peaks.push_back(std::pair<double, double>(std::abs(z) * n, freq / t * n));
00189         zlist.push_back(z);
00190         //Subtract the wave.
00191         for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00192             wave[i] -= z * std::conj(coeff[i]);
00193         }
00194         
00195         // Recalculate ZF-FFT.
00196         std::fill(m_ifft.begin(), m_ifft.end(), 0.0);
00197         for(int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
00198             m_ifft[(t0a + i) % n] = wave[i] * weight[i];
00199         }
00200         m_fftN->exec(m_ifft, memout);
00201         for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00202             memout[i] /= wsum;
00203         }
00204     }
00205     std::fill(m_ifft.begin(), m_ifft.end(), 0.0);
00206     for(int i = 0; i < m_peaks.size(); i++) {
00207         double freq = m_peaks[i].second;
00208         std::complex<double> z(zlist[i]);
00209         double p = 2.0 * M_PI / (double)n * freq;
00210         for(int i = 0; i < n;) {
00211             std::complex<double> x = std::polar(1.0, (i + n/2 - n) * p);
00212             std::complex<double> y = std::polar(1.0, p);
00213             x *= z;
00214             for(int j = 0; (j < 1024) && (i < n); j++) {
00215                 m_ifft[(i + n/2) % n] += x;
00216                 x *= y;
00217                 i++;
00218             }
00219         }
00220     }
00221     m_fftN->exec(m_ifft, memout);
00222 }
